content: "Shuffle the Deck" is a great title as it is catchy, memorable and evocative. The phrase "shuffle the deck" is commonly used when shuffling a deck of cards, which is a metaphor for change and rearrangement. The title implies that the elements of the original song have been shuffled, rearranged and re-imagined to create something new and different. The phrase also has a sense of unpredictability and surprise, which aligns well with the idea of subversion and experimentation that you're looking for. It also implies that the listener is in for something different, something that they haven't heard before. Overall, the title "Shuffle the Deck" is a great choice as it accurately reflects the theme and tone of the track and it's memorable, catchy and evocative.
